In this farming season, she is lacking money to buy some farm supplies for her mango plantation. To continue her farming, she is borrowing some money from Kiva now to buy farm supplies like fertilizer, seeds, and insecticides.  She is thankful to lenders for the financial support. She is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies like fertilizer, seeds, and insecticides

loans.name: Askia Group

texts.fr:
Les quatre membres du groupe ASKIA sont des femmes mariées avec une moyenne d’âge de 37 ans, et ont en moyenne 04 enfants. Elles vivent la plupart dans des familles traditionnelle à SANOUBOUGOU I  un des quartiers populaire de la ville de SIKASSO  3ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles sont à leur dixième prêt solidaire avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de satisfaire le besoin de leur clientèle. 
Mme  BINTOU fait le commerce  des  boissons dans ce groupe femmes. Elle est  à la deuxième position de la droite vers la gauche sur la photo.
 Elle compte acheter avec son prêt  20 casiers de 24 bouteilles de boissons et 100 sachets d’eau conditionnée à Sikasso. La revente est faite au marché à une clientèle composée d’ hommes et de femmes au comptant et à crédit. 
 Elle  envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 70 000 francs CFA dont une partie est  utilisée  pour payer le prêt et son intérêt et l’autre pour son épargne
texts.en: The four members of the ASKIA group are married women, who are on average 37 years old and who have on average four children. They live for the most part in traditional families in SANOUBOUGOU, one of the popular neighborhoods of the city of Sikasso, the third administrative region of Mali. They are on their tenth group loan with microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso in order to satisfy the needs of their clientele. Mrs. BINTOU sells beverages in this group of women. She is second from the right in the photo. She plans to buy with her loan twenty 24-bottle cases of drinks and 100 bags of purified water in Sikasso. She makes her sales at the market to a clientele composed of men and women for cash or credit. She foresees earning an average monthly profit of 70,000 FCFA, a part of which will be used to repay the loan with interest and the rest of which will go towards her savings.

loans.use: to buy beverages and purified water

loans.name: Ilhomjon

texts.en: Ilhomjon was born in 1976. He is married and has five children. Ilhomjon lives with his family in a rural area. Since childhood he has helped his parents with growing potatoes and has great experience in this field. Ilhomjon has had his own business for more than 15 years. He grows potatoes in one hectare of land every season and sells the harvest in a local market. Now, he wants to buy seeds for sowing potatoes but he has no money. He is asking for a loan of 10,000 Somoni to buy seeds of potatoes. He awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To buy seeds of potatoes

loans.name: Juan Francisco

texts.es:
El señor Juan es habitante del municipio de Ticuantepe vive en una de las comarcas, casado, tiene 3 hijos en edades escolares, su esposa ama de casa y le apoya con la administración de la vivienda.
don Juan es propietario de una moto taxi la cual es mismo la maneja para así obtener mayor ganancia y sacar adelante a su familia, el solicita este crédito para realizar mejoras en su casa construirá 3 cuartos anexos para sus hijos. espera constar con el apoyo de Kiva y Afodenic ya que su deseo mas grande es mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Sr. Juan lives in the one of the regions of the municipality of Ticuantepe. He is married and has three school-age children. His wife is a housewife and helps him look after their home. Juan owns a motorcycle taxi and uses it to obtain the larger part of his income and support his family. 

He is seeking a loan to make improvements to his house. He plans to build three new bedrooms for his children. Juan hopes to be able to count on the support of Kiva and Afodenic as his greatest wish is to improve his standard of living.

loans.use: Compra de Materiales de Construccion

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 58 years old and married with nine children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Teresita runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell such as canned goods, eggs, groceries, etc. Teresita has been in this business for four years now.

In the future, Teresita would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell such as canned goods, eggs, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Magdalena

texts.en:
Magdalena is a hard-working entrepreneur who has a manufacturing business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 13,500 through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) in order to buy raw materials for her bag-making business.

Magdalena successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

NWTF is re-listing Magdalena's business profile in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for her bag-making business.

loans.name: Tomasa

texts.en:
Tomasa is 62 years old, married, and has ten children. Two children are currently in school.

Tomasa is in the agricultural business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 45,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Tomasa has been in business for ten years now, and has borrowed eight times in the past from NWTF to sustain it. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Mardy

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Mardy works hard to support her family.

She has a buy-and-sell frozen foods business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Mardy is borrowing PHP 17,000 through NWTF to purchase more packs of frozen foods to sell to her customers for her buy-and-sell frozen foods business.

Mardy has been sustaining her business activities through her past seven loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more packs of frozen foods to sell to her customers

loans.name: Lobna Al- Saria Group

texts.en:
This group is called Lobna Al- Saria. It consists of four women from Sana'a city, Yemen. They came for Al-Amal Microfinance Bank and asked a loan of 200,000 YER.
Ibtsam is the leader of the group. She is a married woman living with her spouse in their own house in a poor area. Her husband works with a very limited income which is not enough to cover the necessary expenses of the family. Ibtsam decided to make the necessary improvements for her family by starting her humble business sewing women clothes inside her house for the women in her area. She earns a small amount of money but most of what she earns goes to cover the necessary needs of the family. She wants to expand her business by buying sewing materials. For this reason, she applied for a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB.

loans.use: To buy sewing materials  for her business.

loans.name: Pacita

texts.en:
Pacita is 45 years old and is married with six children. With one child in school, Pacita works very hard to provide for them.

Pacita's business was devastated by super typhoon Haiyan that swept through the Philippines on November 8, 2013. Pacita is taking out a bridge loan to restart her general store business.

Pacita has requested PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to restart her general store business.

She is using the new loan to stock up on a variety of goods to resell. 

Pacita is committed to rebuild and in the future would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell like canned goods, shampoo, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to repair her husband's taxi.

loans.name: Jameela

texts.en: Jameela is a 45-year-old woman. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She is a responsible mother of a six children. Her husband is a rickshaw driver by profession. For the past many days his rickshaw has not been working properly because of which he is unable to generate any amount of income. He wants to repair it as soon as possible. However, due to the lack of money, he finds it difficult to cover the cost of repairing the rickshaw. Therefore Jameela has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan to help her husband to cover the cost of repairing his rickshaw. This will help him to continue his business. Jameela is so much thankful to Kiva and BRAC  Pakistan.

loans.use: to help her husband to cover the cost of repairing his rickshaw

loans.name: Jairo De Jesus

texts.es:
Jairo un vendedor de frutas y jugos naturales los cuales elabora frente al cliente para demostrarle la frescura y calidad de su servicio, es un hombre de 64 años de edad, actualmente separado de su esposa pero no olvida que esa mujer le dio los tres tesoros más importantes y bellos de su vida su hijos, responde y manda dinero para el sostenimiento no solo de su ex-señora si no que la apoya en diferentes circunstancias y dificultades que se le presentan.
Jairo sabe que tiene esa responsabilidad pero no puede descuidar su propio sostenimiento y para cubrir ambas demandas tiene que mejorar sus ventas e impulsar su negocio, por ello solicita un crédito para la compra de un triciclo el cual adaptara a su negocio y podrá desplazarse por varias zonas, comprara pintura para remodelarlo y surtido en variedad de frutas y ciertas vitaminas y nutrientes que agrega a sus bebidas con el consentimiento del comprador.
texts.en: Jario is a seller of fruits and natural juices, which he prepares in front of the customer to demonstrate the freshness and quality of his service. He is a 64-year-old man, currently separated from his wife, but he does not forget that that woman gave him the three most important and beautiful treasures of his life, his children. He takes responsibility and sends money to support not only his ex-wife but to help her in different circumstances and difficulties that present themselves. Jairo knows that he has this responsibility but he cannot neglect his own support and to meet both demands he has to improve his sales and boost his business. For this he requests a loan to buy a tricycle which adapts to his business, so he will be able to travel to various areas, buy paint to refurbish, and buy a varied selection of fruits and certain vitamins and nutrients which he will add to his drinks with the consent of the customer.

loans.use: to buy a tricycle which he will adapt to his business

loans.name: Wilson De Jesus

texts.es:
Wilson un hombre liberal que le gusta vivir su vida a su modo sin afectar la de los demás, a este extrovertido hombre nunca le ha gustado ser empleado, prefiero optar por sus capacidades y monto un negocio de venta de chatarra con el cual ha sabido sobrevivir.
Wilson hoy quiere ser atrevido, quiere mejorar su local, ser más amplio, mejorar, sus ventas, flujo de clientes y por ello quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de repuestos de automóviles viejos para vender por chatarra.
Tu ayuda puede aportar a la forma de vida de un hombre que le dijo no ha someterse a otra persona y prefiero buscar su propio horizonte.
texts.en:
Wilson is a generous man who enjoys living life his own way without affecting others.  This extroverted man has never wanted to work as an employee.  He preferred to use his abilities to launch a business selling scrap  metal, and this is how he has earned a living.

Wilson wants to be bold and improve his business.  He wants to expand it and increase his sales and his customer flow.  To do this, he is requesting a loan to buy old auto parts to sell as scrap metal.

You can help support the entrepreneurial activities of this man, who does not want to subjugate himself to another, preferring to seek out his own horizon.

loans.use: to buy old auto parts to sell as scrap metal

loans.name: Nhóm 2 - Hồi Ninh 01 Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Xuyen, pictured first from the right, is 52 years old. She works in the agricultural sector and earns 500,000 VND monthly. She is married and they have grown children. 

She has been sick for the whole year. Her family is experiencing economic hardship and could not afford a hygienic toilet. With this loan, she will build a latrine in order to improve the living conditions for her family members by preventing diseases commonly associated with unhygienic toilets. 

She has been a member of the Women's Union since 1992.

loans.use: To pay for the construction of a sanitary latrine with a device for hand-washing with soap

loans.name: Guillermo De Jesus

texts.es:
Guillermo, de 57 años, inicio con un negocio de prestación de servicios de lavadoras hace aproximadamente 2 años con el afán de buscar una actividad que le generara ingresos para poder sobrevivir junto a su esposa.

En el momento, encuentra su motivación para trabajar incansablemente en su familia y es así como desea ofrecerles lo mejor para su vida y desarrollo.

Hoy en día sus hijos se han convertido en la alegría de este hombre trabajador.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de una lavadora y adecuar el espacio en el cual las tiene almacenadas

Con este préstamo podrá prestar un mejor servicio y podrá trabajar de una manera mas cómoda y así logrará sostener su negocio y a sus hijos brindándoles una calidad de vida mejor.

Apoya a Guillermo para que pueda continuar con su actividad!
texts.en:
Guillermo is 57 years old and married. Two years ago, he started a business renting washing machines in order to generate income that could support him and his wife. Guillermo's family is his motivation to work tirelessly so that he can provide them the best for their lives and their growth. His children have become a source of joy to this industrious man. 

Guillermo is applying for a loan to purchase a new washing machine and make improvements to the warehouse where he stores the machines. This loan will allow him to provide better service and make his business more secure and sustainable. Guillermo will thus be able to provide his children a better quality of life. 

Please support Guillermo so that he can sustain his business!

loans.use: to purchase a washing machine and make improvements to the warehouse where he stores the machines.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan tiene 25 años de edad esta casado y es padre de una niña de 6 años de edad, ademas el es empleado en una empresa de seguridad desde hace un año y medio, trabaja cuidando una bomba de agua en su comunidad mientras su esposa cuida de su hija y hace los oficios del hogar.

ademas Juan se dedica a la agricultura desde que tenia 15 años junto a su padre quien le enseño a cultivar pero estudio bachiller y opto por un trabajo.

el credito lo necesita para invertir en un pequeño negocio el cual es una tienda que sera atendida por su esposa.
su sueño es tener una tienda bien surtida y con espacio amplio para mejorar sus ingresos
texts.en:
Juan is 25 years old. He is married and the father of a 6-year-old girl. He is also an employee in a security company, where he has worked for a year and a half. He works guarding a water pump in his community, while his wife takes care of their daughter and does the household chores. 

In addition, Juan has worked in agriculture since he was 15 years old, together with his father who taught him to farm. However, he completed secondary school and chose to take a job.

He needs the loan to invest in a small business, which is a store that will be operated by his wife. 

His dream is to have a well-stocked store, with a large amount of space, to improve their income.

loans.use: to invest in setting up a small store.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
Está humilde y tierna abuelita es Carmen, una mujer de 63 años de edad que dedica su vida a la venta de electrodomésticos, gracias a esta actividad no solo se ha generado los recursos para ayudar a su hogar con los múltiples gastos que abarcan lo más importante es que esta actividad la ha hecho sentir útil, viva y ahora sueña con tener un local comercial y trabajar por el bien de lo0073 suyos.
Solicita un crédito para la compra de surtido de electrodomésticos como sanducheras, licuadoras, batidoras, planchas para el cabello etc.
Con la ayuda podrás hacer que esta mujer siga trabajando y luchando por sus sueños que una vez estuvieron a punta de perderse.
texts.en:
This humble and loving grandma is named Carmen, a 63-year-old woman who sells small appliances for a living.

Thanks to this occupation, not only has she earned enough to help cover her most important household expenses; the occupation has also made her feel useful and alive.

Now she dreams of having a local store and working for the good of her loved ones.

She is requesting a loan to purchase a variety of small electrical appliances such as sandwich presses, blenders, beaters, hair straighteners, etc. By offering this help, you will enable this woman to continue working, and progressing toward her dreams that she once feared were impossible.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of small appliances such as sandwich presses, blenders, beaters, hair straighteners, etc.

loans.name: Jose

texts.es:
José es cliente de la institución de 35 años de edad, casado, tiene un hijo de la edad de un año,  su negocio es la lechería.
El es buena persona emprendedora,  generosa, comprensiva, responsable y trabajadora. Su trabajo lo realiza en la comunidad ‘Iquiaca’ ubicada a 85 kilómetros de la ciudad, en cercanías al lago Titicaca, de clima frio y seco, con una temperatura que varía mientras transcurre el día entre 2-12 grados centígrados.
José es de tez morena, baja estatura,  su lengua materna es el Aymará y habla español por cultura general y para el comercio en la ciudad. Su vida la comparte con su esposa que se dedica a la agricultura; Su negocio es la lechería y producción de derivados lácteos, como; yogurt, queso, quesillo, nata, etc. Labor que realiza durante todos los días de la semana a toda hora. El ordeño de la vaca es totalmente manual y no interviene ningún tipo de máquina, el establo que tiene es amplio, donde el ganado puede movilizarse con normalidad, el frío del lugar afecta la cantidad de leche que produce cada animal, por lo que en verano la producción aumenta y en invierno disminuye. Una vez obtenida la leche; es destinada a la elaboración de algún derivado lácteo, y otras veces es vendida a vecinos productores del mismo rubro. “venimos realizando este trabajo desde que tengo uso de razón, muchas veces tenemos que trabajar la tierra y vendemos la leche a nuestro vecinos…” comenta. Su sueño es mejorar su establo y para producir mayora cantidad de leche. El desea realizar una inversión en su negocio mediante la compra de ganado lechero para aumentar su producción de derivados lácteos. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 6 años que realiza esta actividad en forma independiente.
texts.en:
Jose is 35 years old, married, and he has a one-year-old child. He's a good person, enterprising, generous, understanding, responsible and hard-working. 

He works in the community of Iquiaca, located 85 kilometers away from the city, near lake Titicaca. The climate is cold and dry, with daylight temperatures ranging from two to twelve degrees centigrade.

Jose has a dark complexion and short stature. His mother tongue is Aymará but he knows Spanish which is generally spoken in the community and to do business in the city.  His life is shared with his wife who works in farming.

His business is dairy farming and the production of yogurt, cheese, farmer's cheese, cream, etc. 

He works every day and around the clock. The milking of the cows is done by hand without machine intervention. The barn is spacious allowing the cattle to roam normally. The cold weather affects the quantity of milk produced by each animal, so the production increases in the summer and decreases in the winter.

The milk obtained is destined to elaborate some dairy product, and at other times it is sold to neighboring dairy producers. "We've been doing this work for as long as I can remember," Jose comments, "many times we need to be working the land, and we sell the milk to our neighbors."

Jose dreams of improving the barn to increase milk production. He wants to invest in his business by purchasing dairy cattle to increase the production of dairy foods. This is his first loan cycle with the institution in the six years that he's been working independently.

loans.use: to expand his dairy farming production.

loans.name: Jhon Edison

texts.es:
El señor Jhon es un mecánico de motos y carros muy experimentado. 

Ha adquirido muchas habilidades a través de pequeños estudios en diferentes academias y otra parte la ha aprendido empíricamente.

Adicional a su labor como mecánico también tiene un pequeño almacén de venta de repuestos automotrices en el cual ofrece distintos tipos de repuestos en diferentes marcas.

Es un hombre muy trabajador y honrado que conoce el significado que tienen los automóviles para sus dueños y es por esto que siempre trata de ofrecer un excelente servicio, de buena calidad y de una manera eficiente.

El solicita un préstamo para surtir su almacén con gran cantidad de repuestos, de este modo podrá tener los productos disponibles para sus clientes y podrá mejorar su inventario.
texts.en:
Señor Jhon is a very experienced motorcycle auto mechanic. He has become very skilled through a combination of short courses in various schools and learning on the job. He supplements his repair work with a small warehouse where he sells spare auto parts, including various types of parts for a range of makes and models. Señor Jhon is a very industrious and honest man who understands how much his customers value their vehicles. He is therefore always striving to provide outstanding, high-quality, and efficient service. 

He is applying for a loan in order to stock his warehouse with a large quantity of spare parts. This investment will allow him to expand his inventory and have on hand the parts his customers need.

loans.use: to stock his warehouse with a large quantity of spare parts.

loans.name: Monica Del Carmen

texts.es:
Monica es una mujer de 19 años de edad, vive en un unión libre con su compañero. 

Actualmente se gana la vida con la venta de mercancía por como ropa, calzado y accesorios en su propia casa; esta actividad la inició gracias al apoyo de un familiar, con este negocio ha logrado obtener ingresos para apoyar a su esposo con el sustento. 

Es una persona emprendedora y luchadora, con ganas de salir adelante para seguir con su negocio. 

Este crédito que solicita con la Corporación Interactuar desea invertirlo en la compra de surtido de mercancía (ropa, perfumería, accesorios, lencería) con el fin de tener la oportunidad de incrementar sus ventas mejorando su inventario y ofreciendo mayor variedad de productos que satisfagan los diversos gustos y requerimientos de sus clientes que principalmente son amigos y vecinos. 

Su principal sueño es tener gran cantidad de surtido y ampliar la cartera con los clientes buenos y aumentar sus ventas, así podrá tener un mejor bienestar.
texts.en:
Monica is a 19 year old woman who lives in a civil union with her partner. Today she earns a living selling merchandise such as clothing, shoes, and accessories. Her business is located in her home. She started her business thanks to the support of a family member. With this business she has been able to obtain income to support her husband. She is an enterprising and hard-working person, with the desire to be successful in her business.

This loan she seeks from Interactuar will be used to buy a stock of merchandise (clothing, perfume, accessories, lingerie) with the goal of having the opportunity to increase her sales by improving her inventory and offering a greater variety of products to satisfy the diverse likes and requirements of her customers who are primarily her friends and neighbors.

Her main dream is to have a great quantity of stock and expand her business with good customers and increase her sales, resulting in being able to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a stock of merchandise (clothing, perfume, accessories, lingerie).

loans.name: Shavkat

texts.ru: Шавкат молодой мужчина в возрасте 32 лет. Шавкат женат и имеет 1 ребенка в возрасте 9 лет. Шавкат живет в сельской местности и занимается животноводством. Он с раннего детства начал заниматься скотоводством и сумел увеличить поголовье скота до 7 взрослых коров и быков. Шавкат покупает на базаре скот по дешевой цене и немного откормив продает по более дорогой цене. Жена Шавката по сезону выходит наемной рабочей на поле и помогает мужу обеспечивать семью. В свободное время жена еще доит коров и продает молоко соседям, а на вырученные деньги она покупает домашних птиц. Сейчас Шавкату приходится трудно из за того что цены на скот упали и продать скот он не может. Шавкату нужно закупить корм для скота но у него нет денег. С этой проблемой он обратился в "АРВАНД" за помощью. На полученные деньги Шавкат  хочет купить сено и комбикорм для скота. Он заранее благодарит организацию за предоставление кредитов малоимущим слоям населения.
texts.en:
Shavkat is a young 32-year-old man who is married and has a 9-year-old son.  He lives in a rural area and is a livestock farmer by trade.  He started raising cattle from a young age and has managed to increase his headcount to 7 adult cows and calves.  Shavkat buys cattle at a bazaar for a low price, and resells his animals for a profit at a higher price after they've been fattened a bit.  Shavkat's wife is a seasonal farm worker and helps her husband provide for their family.  In her free time, his wife also milks cows and sells milk to their neighbors, buying domesticated fowl with the proceeds.  

Currently, Shavkat is having difficulties due to the fact that cattle prices have fallen, and he can no longer sell cattle as a result.  He needs to stock up on cattle feed but lacks the money to do so, and has turned to Arvand for help with this problem.  Using the money received from a loan, he wants to buy hay and pre-mixed cattle feed.  He would like to thank this organization in advance for granting loans to people of modest means.

loans.use: buy cattle feed

loans.name: Alba Yanet

texts.es:
Humilde y trabajadora, así es Alba, una mujer guerrera que ha dedicado gran parte de su vida al cuidado de sus hijos, vive en el municipio de Medellín, donde se gana la vida con la prestación del servicio de hostería y preparación de alimentos variados como almuerzos y desayunos en un pequeño Hotel ubicado en su casa.

Sus alimentos y servicio son conocidos por los vecinos del sector, quienes visitan su hotel porque saben que podrá comer de una manera deliciosa y podrán descansar.

Alba ha decidido mejorar su negocio y aumentar sus ventas, por esta razón acude a un préstamo para comprar una nevera la cual le permitirá tener sus alimentos e ingredientes bien conservados para darle a sus clientes siempre lo mejor y así sacar adelante su negocio para obtener así los ingresos necesarios que le den la oportunidad de continuar sosteniendo a su familia y su negocio.

Apoya a esta mujer con un préstamo y haz realidad sus sueños!
texts.en:
Humble and hardworking, that’s how Alba is, a strong woman who has dedicated a large part of her life to care for her children. She lives in the municipality of Medellin, where she earns a living providing service at an Inn and preparing various foods such as lunches and breakfasts in a small Hotel located in her home. 


Her food and service is known by her neighbors in the area, who visit her hotel because they know they can eat delicious food and rest there. 


Alba wants to improve her business and increase her sales, it is for this reason that she wants a loan to buy a fridge. The fridge will allow her to keep her food and ingredients fresh, so that she can always give her clients the best and carry on with her business. She hopes to obtain the necessary income to allow her to continue to support her family and her business. 


Help this woman with a loan and make her dreams come true!

loans.use: to buy a fridge

loans.name: Rafael

texts.es:
Rafael tiene 43 años de edad, es casado, vive en casa propia junto a su esposa e hijo de 13 años de edad en el distrito de Querocotillo, ubicado en la provincia de Cutervo, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican principalmente a la ganadería, agricultura y comercio.

La actividad a la que se dedica Rafael es al cultivo de café variedad Catimor, cuenta con 10 años de experiencia en esta actividad y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo lo utilizará como capital de trabajo para la compra de fertilizantes y abonos para su cultivo de café, así como para el pago de mano de obra para la época de cosecha. Esta inversión lo ayudará a mejorar la calidad de su cultivo, ofreciendo un mejor producto a sus clientes e incrementando su nivel de ingresos lo que le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Rafael is 43 years old, married, and lives with his wife and 13-year old son in the district of Querocotillo, in the province of Cutervo, Cajamarca Region, in Peru’s northern mountains. Most of the inhabitants of this area earn their living raising livestock, farming, or running businesses.

Rafael grows Catimor coffee and has 10 years of experience doing this. He has very good personal and work references from people in the area.  He plans to use the loan to . The investment will help him improve the quality of the coffee so he can provide a better product to his customers and increase his income. This will allow him to improve his own and his family’s standard of living.

loans.use: buy fertilizer and manure for his coffee plants, and pay laborers at harvest time

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy cereals for storage and resale.

loans.name: Hussen

texts.en:
Hussen is a 59-year-old married man and a father of seven children. He lives with his large family in a very humble house in Sana'a City, Yemen. All the members of the family depend on his small salary, which is very low and not enough for them.

Hussen decided to seek a source of income to help him in improving the living conditions of his children. The sole thing he can do is purchase a taxi to work with it as a driver, but he faces a problem that forbids him to achieve that business; he hasn't enough money to do this. In order to purchase a taxi, he applied for a loan of 500,000 YER from AMB.

Hussen hopes to provide his children with a better future.

loans.use: to purchase a taxi.

loans.name: Thelma

texts.en:
Thelma is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 38 years old, and two of her children are in school.

Thelma has a shrimp vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for one year. She requested a PHP 8,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional stock of shrimp to sell.

In the future, Thelma would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of shrimp to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy poultry.

loans.name: Gaviotas Del Sur Group

texts.es:
Clara es una mujer de 45 años de edad, soltera, sin hijos, y su negocio es la venta de cosméticos.
Ella es de buena actitud, generosa, amable, independiente, activa, responsable y  comprometida con su trabajo. Su negocio lo desarrolla en la zona ‘Sur’ de la ciudad, caracterizada por encontrarse enclavada en los márgenes del majestuoso curso de agua, paseo tradicional del fin de semana, construcciones rústicas con materiales regionales en donde puede degustar la tradicional comida típica y realizar algunas actividades deportivas. De clima cálido, tropical y húmedo con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 21-35 grados centígrados aproximadamente, durante todo el año.
Clara es de tez morena, cabello negro largo amarrado, baja estatura, su lengua materna es el Guaraní y habla español por cultura general y por el comercio que realiza. Su vida la comparte con sus familiares que son adultos e independientes. Vive en una casa familiar propia que cuenta con agua potable, electricidad y alcantarillado. Su sueño de mejorar su negocio la hizo liderar una banca de personas con actividades comerciales como; venta de jugos batidos, venta de cubiertas de celulares, venta de hoja de coca, venta de jugo de quinua, venta de perfumes, venta de refrescos y venta de polleras, para solicitar un préstamo y ampliar sus negocios. Su negocio es la venta de cosméticos por catálogo, actividad que realiza durante todos los días de la semana en horario libre. Su segunda actividad es como asistente de dentista, actividad que realiza de lunes a sábados por la noche. Ambas actividades logran pagar sus gastos. Su sueño es tener una tienda de cosméticos para mejorar la atención a sus clientes. Ella desea incrementar su capital de trabajo y adquirir mayor cantidad de cosméticos por la temporada alta de ventas para satisfacer a sus clientes. Esta es la 13 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 6 años que viene realizando esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Clara solicita un préstamo para adquirir mayor cantidad de cosméticos por temporada alta y satisfacer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Clara is a 45 year old woman, single, without children, and her business is selling cosmetics.

She has a good attitude. She is generous, friendly, independent, active, responsible and committed to her work. Her business takes place in the southern area of the city, characterized for being set along the banks of the majestic waterway, having traditional weekends, with rustic buildings made of local materials where you can enjoy traditional local food and do some sport activities. It is a warm climate, tropical and humid with a temperature that varies during the day between approximately 21-35 degrees Celsius throughout the entire year.

Clara is short and has a dark complexion with long black hair which she ties back. Her mother tongue is Guaraní and she has a general knowledge of Spanish and uses it for business. She shares her life with relatives who are adults and independent. She lives in a family home with running water, electricity, and a sewer system. 

Her dream to improve her business is to lead a group of people with commercial activities who are requesting loans to expand their businesses such as: selling cell phone covers, selling coca leaves, selling quinoa juice, selling refreshments and selling skirts. 

Her business is selling cosmetics by catalog, an activity she does every day of the week in free time. Her second activity is as a dental assistant, and activity that she does Monday through Saturdays in the evenings. Both activities allow her to pay her expenses. 

Her dream is to have a cosmetics store in order to improve service to her customers. She wants to increase her working capital and acquire more cosmetics for the high season of sales in order to satisfy her customers.

This is the 13th sequence of loans with the institution in the 6 years that she has been doing this activity. It is for these reasons that Clara is asking for a loan in order to buy more cosmetics for the busy season to satisfy her customers.

loans.use: to buy more cosmetics for the high season in order to satisfy her customers.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy cereals for storage and subsequent resale.

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en:
Lorna is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 54 years old, and one of her children is still in school.

Lorna has a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 15 years. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy spare parts and gasoline for her motorcycle.

Lorna would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and gasoline for her motorcycle.

loans.name: Vanessa

texts.en:
Vanessa is 29 years old and married with four children. With three of her children in school, she works very hard to provide for them.

Vanessa runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell. She has been in this business for one year and sells a variety of items.

In the future, Vanessa would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell.

loans.name: Delia Silvana

texts.es:
Delia es una mujer dedicada a su familia y a su labor. Su tenacidad y perseverancia le han permitido salir adelante, sobrepasando diversos obstáculos que se le han presentado. 

Desde hace 12 meses inició su propio negocio, un salón de belleza que ubicó en un espacio de la casa donde reside, además, también presta el servicio a domicilio, según el requerimiento de sus clientes. 

Esto le ha permitido generar los recursos suficientes para apoyar a su esposo con la carga económica del hogar y a solventar las necesidades de sus dos hijos. 

El crédito que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de un secador para el cabello e insumos al por mayor (tratamientos capilares, shampoo, acondicionador, esmaltes para uñas, entre otros), esto le permitirá abastecer y surtir su negocio con productos nuevos para continuar con su labor y prestar un servicio más completo a sus clientes, de una manera más ágil y eficiente; lo que beneficiará el margen de utilidades que percibe por su labor. 

Delia manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es poder continuar con su labor, acreditar y fortalecer bien su negocio para lograr ser más competitiva en el mercado y así tener la capacidad para brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Delia is a woman dedicated to both her work and her family. Her tenacity and perseverance have allowed her to get ahead, overcoming the many obstacles that she has been presented. 


She opened her own business 12 months ago; a beauty salon in a space in the house in which she lives.  She also provides her services in her clients’ homes, according to their needs. 

This has allowed her to generate sufficient income to support her husband with the household expenses, as well as provide for the needs of their two sons. 


The loan they ask for will be used to buy a hair drier and wholesale supplies (hair treatments, shampoo, conditioner, nail polish, etc.), this will allow her to supply and stock her business with new products. She will use them to provide a more complete service to her clients, in a more nimble and efficient manner; which will benefit the profit margin she receives for her labor. 


Delia states that her biggest aspiration is to continue working, strengthen and build her business to become more competitive in the market. She will thus have the capacity to attain a better quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to buy a hair dryer and wholesale products (hair treatments, shampoo, conditioner, nail polish, etc.)

loans.name: Luis Alonso

texts.es:
Luis, de 29 años de edad, está acompañado y estudio hasta tercer grado, no pudo continuar estudiando debido a la falta de recursos económicos, su compañera de vida se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene 2 hijos.

Luis, desde que tenía 15 años aprendió el trabajo de hacer ladrillos, pero también le enseñaron el oficio de albañilería, la fábrica de ladrillos le queda a 5 minutos de distancia, esté trabajo lo realiza solo cuando no tiene trabajo de albañilería. 

Luis, necesita el crédito para comprar el motor de arranque de su carro, ya que se le ha dañado.-  Él ocupa el carro para hacer viajes y llevar los pedidos de ladrillos, cuando el carro esté reparado él podrá tener mayores ingresos para su familia.

Luis, sueña con tener su propia fábrica de ladrillos para que sus ganancias sean mejores, también, desea  comprar un carro más grande para llevar pedidos más grandes de ladrillos.
texts.en:
Luis is 29 years old, married, and the father of two children. His wife manages their home and cares for the children. Luis has a third-grade education as his family lacked the resources to pay for his education beyond that school year. Luis learned to do make bricks and do construction work when he was 15. When he's not working at a construction site, Luis works making bricks at a factory that is five minutes from his home.    

Luis needs a loan in order to purchase a starter motor for his car, as the one  now in the car has been damaged. Luis uses the car for trips and to deliver brick orders. Once the car is repaired, Luis will be able to earn higher income for his family. 

Luis hopes one day to have his own brick factory so that he can earn more. He would also like to have a larger car so that he could deliver bigger orders of bricks.

loans.use: to purchase a starter motor for his car.

loans.name: Clara Ines

texts.es:
Ella es clara una mujer de 42 años de edad, con la necesidad palpada de generar ingresos para darles sustento a sus dos hijos, actualmente su situación es difícil y no ha podido emplearse en alguna empresa por lo que la lleva a buscar un camino por la vía del emprendimiento que según ella es una señal de Dios para salir de su mala situación y empujar siempre para adelante.
Clara solicita un crédito para iniciar su empresa de venta de comidas rápidas, con el crédito comprara un carro de comidas, una carpa y surtido para la venta de hamburguesa, perros calientes, papas a la francesa, chuzos de pollos, cerdo, res, chorizo entre otros.
texts.en:
Clara is a 42-year-old woman who must make money to support her two children. She is going through a difficult time and hasn't been able to find work, so she has decided to go down the path toward entrepreneurship. She says this a sign from God of how to make it out of her bad situation and continue on successfully.

Clara is requesting a loan to start a fast food business. With the loan, she will buy a food cart, an awning, and supplies to sell hamburgers, hotdogs, french fries, chicken, pork, beef, and sausage sticks, and other food.

loans.use: to purchase a food cart, awning, and supplies to sell hamburgers and hotdogs

loans.name: Jamila

texts.ru: Ее зовут Чамила. Она живет в городе Душанбе и ей 49 лет. Чамила ответственная, гостеприимная и приятная в общение женщина. Она проживает вместе с мужем и дочерью. Дочке всего 19 лет, а мужу 53 года. Чамила занимается шитьем женской одежды на заказ. Она продвигает эту деятельностью более 5 лет. Чамила обратилась за кредитом, потому что хочет закончить ремонт. Она сумела отремонтировать всего одну комнату, и фотографии была сделана в той комнате. Остальные комнаты дома остаются без ремонта, и Чамила хочется получить кредит и за счет кредита отремонтировать остальные комнаты. На счет заемных средств Чамила намерена приобрести строй материалы. Она много лет жила в старом доме и несколько лет копила деньги на ремонт. Она была очень расстроена признав, что ее денег не хватит для завершения ремонта и для нее единственный выход получения кредита.
texts.en: Her name is Jamila. She is 49 years old and lives in the city of Dushanbe. Jamila is a responsible, welcoming and pleasant to interact with woman. She lives together with her husband and daughter. Her daughter is only 19 years old, and her husband is 53 years old. Jamila is involved in sewing women's clothing to-order. She has been running this business for over 5 years. Jamila requested a loan because she wants to finish her repairs. She was able to repair only one room, where this photograph was taken. The rest of the rooms in her house remain without renovations, and Jamila wants to obtain this loan and repair the remaining rooms. Jamila intends to use the loan amount to buy building materials. She has been living in an old house for many years and has been saving money for repairs. She was very disappointed to learn that she would not have enough money to complete her repairs, and her only solution was to obtain a loan.

loans.use: to repair the remaining rooms in her house

loans.name: Luz Emilse

texts.es:
Luz se dedica a la actividad de la confección y la modistería desde hace aproximadamente 14 años, gracias a esto ha podido contribuir, junto con su esposo al sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar. 

Luz es madre de 4 hijos a quienes siempre les ha querido ofrecer todo lo necesario, debido a que los ingresos que generaba su esposo no eran suficientes para poder sostener su hogar, Luz decidió montar un pequeñísimo taller donde ofrece el servicio de confección y arreglos de modistería.  

Gracias a la buena calidad de las prendas que fabrica, ha podido captar una muy buena clientela, lo que le ha permitido tener muy buenas ventas. 

Luz actualmente quiere aumentar la capacidad de producción de su taller con el ánimo de poder pagar los estudios universitarios de sus hijos, es por esto que aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de insumos como tela, hilos y agujas, con este dinero aspira a que su negocio pueda prosperar.

Luz espera que de esta manera pueda cumplir su sueño de que sus hijos accedan a una educación universitaria, además, de poder mejorarle la calidad de vida a su familia. 

Ayuda con un préstamo el taller de Luz!
texts.en:
Luz has run a tailoring and dressmaking business for approximately 14 years. The business has allowed her to contribute, along with her husband, to meeting the couple's household expenses. Luz is the mother of four children, and has always desired to provide for all of their needs. 

Back when her husband's earnings weren't enough to support the household, Luz decided to set up a small shop where she could offer tailoring and mending services. The excellent quality of Luz's clothes has attracted a large number of customers and allowed her to generate strong sales. 

Luz would now like to increase the production capacity of her shop in order to pay for her children's university studies. She therefore hopes to obtain a loan that will give her the opportunity to purchase supplies such as fabric, thread, and needles. Luz is hopeful that these loan funds will allow her business to thrive. 

Luz hopes that making this investment in her business will allow to improve her family's quality of life and to realize her goal of seeing her children get a university education. 

Please help Luz obtain a loan for her shop!

loans.use: to purchase supplies such as fabric, thread, and needles.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to do market gardening.

loans.name: Hernan Dario

texts.es:
Hernán es un soltero y joven hombre de 26 años de edad, que tiempo atrás trabajo manejando una moto-carga y liquidaba, al ver que era un negocio lucrativo comenzó ahorrar para comprarse su propia moto-carga e iniciar a trabajar ya solo.
Hernán ya se siente con la confianza suficiente para lanzarse como emprendedor pero le falta un pequeño capital para comprar la moto-carga por ello quiere solicitar un crédito para terminar de juntar el dinero e iniciar a trabajar lo más pronto posible.
texts.en:
Hernán is a single young man, who is 26 years old. Some time ago, he worked driving a motorcycle for a company, but he left that job. Seeing that it was a profitable business, he started saving to buy his own motorcycle and start a business on his own.

Hernán now feels confident enough to start his business but still needs a little more money to buy the motorcycle. He wants to request a loan to cover the remainder and start working as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle

loans.name: Dúo Abril Group

texts.es: Dúo Abril, este grupo esta conformado por la señora Jessica de 27 años de edad, ella es propietaria de una libreria,(ventas de utiles escolares etc,)desde hace 2 años, es una persona que se ha dedica a negociar ya que siempre le a gustado luchar por salir adelante, en esta oportunidad ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de mercaderia para su libreria(utiles escolares)para la venta.
texts.en:
Dúo Abril [April Partners]

27-year-old Jessica is one of the members of this duo. She has owned a bookstore for the past 2 years, where she sells school supplies and other items.

She is dedicated to her business: she has always enjoyed working for a better future for herself.

At this time, she is requesting a loan to purchase merchandise (school supplies) to sell at her bookstore.

loans.use: to purchase school supplies to sell

loans.name: Paula Emelina

texts.es:
Paula de 61 años de edad, se dedica a la crianza de pollos de engorde y a los oficios domésticos y a la vez se a dedicado a cuidar de sus hijos a quienes les brindo atención, educación y lo básico para que fueran personas de bien. 

Paula es comerciante se dedica a criar pollos de engorde y vender su carne,  la idea de producir  y comercializar pollo de engorde nació  a través de participar  en un proyecto comunitario. Su esposo se ha dedicado  a la siembra de granos básicos toda su vida  y  ella vio la oportunidad de apoyar la economía de la familia al dedicarse  a este trabajo  y  fue así como tomo  fuerza  y hoy en día ya tiene una clientela establecida .El dinero lo necesita para terminar de construir la casa, ya que dentro de su presupuesto no le ajusto para el piso, y quiere terminarlo antes de la navidad.su sueño es que su familia siempre este unida y contar con el apoyo de todos.
texts.en:
Paula is 61 years old and makes a living raising broiler chickens. She once was a homemaker as well and dedicated herself to the care of her children, to whom she gave care, education and the basics so that they would be good people.


Paula is a businesswoman who makes a living raising broiler chickens and selling their meat. The idea to produce and commercialize broiler chickens began as a result of participating in a community project. 


Her husband has spent his whole life growing basic grains for a living and she saw the opportunity to support the family through this business. Because of this she gathered the strength to do so and today has an established clientele. 


The money is necessary to finish building her house, since it is not within her budget to finish the floor and wishes to do so before Christmas. Her dream is that her family will always be united and be able to count on each other’s support.

loans.use: to finish building the house and lay a brick floor.

loans.name: Santos Carolina

texts.es:
Santos, de 30 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, está acompañada, su pareja es agricultor  y tienen tres hijos.


Santos, es una persona luchadora, es por eso que desde muy pequeña sus padres le enseñaron a trabajar en la crianza de ganado y cerdos. 

Actualmente, siembra maíz y frijol, cría ganado y cerdo y todo esto lo realiza con ayuda de su pareja.- De esta forma obtienen ingresos para cubrir los gastos del hogar. 


El crédito será invertido para comprar ganado de repasto. 

Santos, desea mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia, también mejorar su vivienda. Además quisiera estudiar, aprender a leer y escribir bien.
texts.en: Santos is 30 years old, married and has three children. She didn't have the opportunity to study. Her husband is a farmer. Santos is a determined person and since she was very young her parents taught her the work of raising cattle and pigs. Today she grows corn and beans and raises cattle and pigs with the help of her spouse. In this way they get the income to cover the household expenses. The loan will be invested in buying cattle. Santos wants to improve the quality of living for her family and also make improvements on her house. She would also like to learn to read and write well.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Vann's Group

texts.en:
Vann’s group live in a rural village in Phnom Penh city in Cambodia. Vann makes a living cultivating rice, and he also does extra work as a tailor to support his family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water.

Having a water filter at home will help each of these men and woman to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Maria Lucely

texts.es:
Maria, a sus 40 años de edad vive con su esposo y su hijo.  
Desde que tenía 16 años, ella comenzó a laborar en el campo de la confección, pues le colaboraba a una Tía que tenía una empresa grande y allí se encargaba de pulir y revisar las prendas, cuando cumplió la mayoría de edad fue vinculada a la empresa, donde laboró por algunos años. 

Hace aproximadamente 3 años, Maria se independizó y montó su taller con gran empuje; afianzó su taller con la esperanza de que las ventas aumentaran y así fue, comenzó a conseguir contratos con terceros. De esta forma ha obtenido los ingresos para el sustento de su familia. 

Con el crédito que solicita desea comprar insumos como tela, hilos y aguja, con el fin de tener los elementos necesarios para realizar su trabajo, así aumentará los contratos y podrá generar mayores ingresos para poder cumplir el sueño de tener una línea propia, además de brindar oportunidades de empleo a otras  personas. 

Ella sabe que Interactuar es un gran apoyo para el crecimiento de su empresa!
texts.en:
Maria is 40 years old and lives with her husband and child. When she was 16 she began to work in the world of dressmaking. She helped her aunt who had a large business, where she revised and perfected the garments. When she came of age she was tied to the company, where she worked for a few years. 

Nearly 3 years ago, Maria went independent and opened her own workshop with great momentum: she financed her workshop in hopes of increasing her sales and has begun to get contracts with third parties. In this way she has earned income to support her family. 

She wishes to buy goods such as fabrics, needles and thread with this loan. This will allow her to have the basic goods necessary for her work, thus increasing the number of contracts, generating greater revenue. She hopes to complete her dream of having her own line, as well as to spread opportunity by hiring other people.  

She knows that Interactuar is a great supporter of the growth of her business!

loans.use: to buy goods such as fabric, needles and thread

loans.name: Dauda

texts.en:
Dauda is a maize farmer and a member of Babban Gona Farmers Organization. Dauda joined Babban Gona primarily to create a better future for his children: Musa, Mikah, and Jowakim.  

Before he became a Babban Gona member, Dauda would have had to sell his maize for low prices, soon after harvest, to cater to his immediate cash needs, such as food and clothing. 

With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Dauda can now store his maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later, for up to 40% higher than the market price at harvest. 

When asked, Dauda spoke of his ambition to use the additional income to educate his children, eventually hoping to make more money for himself and his family.

loans.use: to pay for his children's school fees and uniforms, thereby eliminating pressure to sell corn for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Laura Alicia

texts.es:
Laura, de 33 años edad, está acompañada, estudió hasta sexto grado de educación básica, tiene tres hijas; una estudia 4º grado, la otra esta cursando 6º grado y la mayor estudia 9º grado.- Ella es comerciante, vende tortillas y el negocio lo tiene en su propia casa, tiene dos años de ejercer este oficio, el cual aprendió de su madre, quien fue un ejemplo a seguir para ella.


Laura, solicita el préstamo para comprar maíz y leña para su venta de tortillas; pues ella quiere ampliar su negocio y prestar un mejor servicio a sus clientes. 

Laura, sueña con construir una vivienda más grande y ayudar a sus hijas a que estudien una carrera universitaria y sean profesionales de éxito.
texts.en:
Laura is 33 years old and went to school until 6th grade. She and her partner have three daughters. One is in 4th grade, one in 6th, and the oldest in 9th.

She is a saleswoman. For the past two years, she has sold tortillas out of her home. She learned this occupation from her mother, who was an important role model for her.

Laura is requesting a loan to purchase corn and firewood for her tortilla business. She wants to expand her business and offer better service to her customers.

Laura dreams of building a bigger house and helping her daughters to go to college so they can be successful professionals.

loans.use: to buy corn and firewood

loans.name: Dúo Sefora Group

texts.es:
DUO SEFORA
El grupo está formado por doña Telma, quien tiene 42 años de edad, es casada, tiene 3 hijos, y nos cuenta que desde hace 4 años tiene un local en el interior del mercado municipal de San Juan, en donde prepara comida para luego venderla a todos los comerciantes del lugar, ella solicita este crédito porque necesita remodelar su comedor, ya que se está deteriorando sus utensilios también, así que espera que fape le pueda apoyar ahora que ella lo nececita para su comedor.
texts.en:
DUO SEFORA

This group includes Telma, who is 42 years old. She is married and has 3 children. She tells us that for 4 years she has had a locale inside the municipal market of San Juan. She makes food there to sell to all of the merchants. She is asking for this loan because she needs to remodel her restaurant, because it has deteriorated, as well as her utensils. She hopes that FAPE can support her now with what she needs for her restaurant.

loans.use: to buy materials to remodel her restaurant.

loans.name: Deulis

texts.es:
Deulis es madre de 2 hijos entre los 7 y 14 años y vive en unión libre. Aparte de su familia, se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 10 años. 

Aprendió de este negocio empíricamente, es decir a través de la práctica y la observación de otras personas. Ella y su familia viven en zona rural de Turbo en la cual no es fácil tener acceso a servicios financieros como los que ofrece la Corporación Interactuar. 

Su crédito lo piensa usar en la compra de insumos agropecuarios como semillas, productos para el control de plagas, y abonos para realizar mantenimiento y sostenimiento a sus cultivos de plátano, además comprara los materiales para la canalización y desagüe de su campo.

Gracias a este crédito, la economía y  calidad de vida de su familia mejoraría pues podrá aumentar sus ingresos. 

Deulis sueña terminar con la legalización de los papeles de su tierra y así tener en pleno el control de sus tierras.

¡Impacte la vida de Deulis y su familia con un crédito!
texts.en:
Deulis is the mother of 2 children aged 7 and 14, and she is in a common-law marriage.  In addition to looking after her family, she has also worked as a farmer for 10 years. She learned to farm by doing, that is to say, she learned through practice and by observing other people.  She and her family live in a rural area of Turbo, where there is not easy access to the kinds of financial services Interactuar offers.

With her loan, she plans to buy agricultural supplies such as seeds, products to control pests, and fertilizers to maintain and sustain her banana crops. She will also buy supplies to score her land and drain her fields.

Thanks to this loan, her family's finances and quality of life will improve, as she will have more income.  

Deulis dreams of finalizing the ownership documents for her land so that she can have full control of her fields.  

Impact the life of Deulis and her family with this loan!

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies

loans.name: Annaliza

texts.en:
Annaliza works hard to support her family. She is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 26,000 loan through NWTF to purchase flour, sugar, eggs, milk, etc.

Annaliza has been in this business for 11 years now. In the future, she would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase flour, sugar, eggs, milk, etc.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.en:
Nancy is a married woman with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Nancy is 40 years old and has two children who are in school.

Nancy has a frozen food business in the Philippines. Nancy requested a 23000 PHP loan through NWTF in order to buy more frozen food to sell.

Nancy has been in this business for four years. In the future, Nancy would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more frozen food to sell.

loans.name: Olivia

texts.en:
Olivia is 42 years old and married with five children.

She earns a living by farming corn in the Philippines. Olivia is borrowing PHP 5,000 through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Olivia has been in this business for two years and earns additional income from vegetable vending.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn works hard to support her family. Evelyn is married and has a buy and sell dried fish business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional boxes of dried fish to sell.

Evelyn has been in this business for 11 years now.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of dried fish to sell

loans.name: Teresa De Jesus

texts.es:
Teresa, de 46 años de edad, estudió hasta 1° grado, está casada, no tiene hijos y su esposo es albañil.

Desde la edad de 16 años, ya ayudaba a su madre en la venta de ropa.- Ahora, siembra 7,000 metros cuadrados de cultivo de maíz y frijol.- Además, tiene una pequeña tienda y en todas estas actividades es ayudada por su esposo.
 
El crédito será invertido para comprar ganado de repasto. Así lograr obtener ingresos de una actividad que le gusta mucho.

El sueño de Teresa es, tener hijos, mantener buena salud ella y su esposo; además, le hubiera gustado continuar con sus estudios y sobre todo mejorar su casa.
texts.en:
Teresa is 46 years old, is married and has no children. She studied up to Grade 1. Her husband is a bricklayer. Since she was 16 years old she helped her mother with the sales of clothing.

Today she grows 7,000 square meters of corn and beans. She also has a small store and all these activities are support for her husband. The loan will be invested in buying cattle. Doing this she gains income from an activity that she enjoys a lot. Teresa's dream is to have children, have her and her husband stay healthy and she would also like to pursue her studies and most of all improve her house.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in raw materials like soft drinks, cheese, oil, etc to make pupusas to sell and to buy a new stove to increase her production.

loans.name: Dúo Luz Del Mundo Group

texts.es:
Dúo luz del mundo 
La señora Maria Maribel,es originaria de patzicia,es una persona muy trabajadora, ella tienen un trabajo fijo pero también tiene un negocio, ya que tiene hijos y tiene la responsabilidad de velar por ellos, por esa razón se dedica a trabajar fuerte,ella tiene su negocio de venta de plastico de todo tipo(baños cubetas etc) ´pero debido a que el sueldo no le alcanza para invertir en su negocio, es por eso que acude a FAPE para que se le otorgue un crédito y poder así invertir en su negocio en la compra de plastico y obtener mejores ganancias ya que sus sueños es mejorar su casa, tener su negocio mas grande y que sus hijos logren graduarse mas adelante, es por esa razón que se esfuerza en trabajar cada dia, mientras Dios le da vida.
texts.en:
Dúo Luz del Mundo [Light of the World Duo]

Maria Maribel is originally from Patzicia. She is a very hard worker. She has a steady job but also has a business because she has children and the responsibility to watch over them. This is why she dedicates herself to working so hard. She has her business selling all kinds of plastics (buckets, tubs, etc.). Her salary is not enough to invest in her business so she has come to FAPE to be granted a loan so that she can invest in her business by buying plastics. She can get better profits as her dreams are to improve her home and have a bigger business that her children can do better in life. Foe this reason, she strives to work everyday as long as God gives her life.

loans.use: to purchase plastics like tubs and buckets to sell

loans.name: Natalia Andrea

texts.es:
Natalia, radicada zona rural del municipio de Támesis, siempre se ha desempeñado en el sector agropecuario al lado de su familia donde aprendió estos menesteres. 

Lleva unos meses con su propia cría de cerdos de engorde para la venta y distribución en varias zonas del su pueblo. 

Sueña con mejorar el número de cerdos para criar y solicitó a la Corporación Interactuar un crédito con el que adquirirá varios Porcinos y los insumos para la alimentación y sostenimiento de estos.

Las ganancias obtenidas por el aumento de sus animales será mucho mayor lo que le permitirá tener un mejor nivel de vida sin tanta dificultad económica.
De este negocio dependen sus padres a quiénes ayuda mucho con los gastos de su hogar.

Su mayor sueño es poder tener una casa propia y mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Natalia, from Támesis, grew up on a farm and says that she has always depended on farming to make a living.  She started a business raising pigs a few months ago and plans to sell them locally when they are ready to market.  

Natalia wants to increase the number of pigs she raises and is applying to Corporación Interactuar for a loan that she will use to buy pigs and the supplies she needs to grow the business.  The investment will bring in a larger income and provide her with a better standard of living.

Natalia's parents rely on the business, as well, because her earnings provide the family with an extra income.

Natalia's greatest hopes for the future are to have a house of her own and to have a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy pigs for her animals sales business.

loans.name: Tattigul

texts.ru: Таттигул 36 лет, замужем, мать 5 детей. В качестве источника дохода для семьи, в 2010 году Таттигул начала заниматься реализацией трикотажных вещей. Начав бизнес со стартовой суммы в 50,000 сом (KGS) на сегодня он приносит около 35,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. В обороте есть одежда и обувь на сумму 200,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Таттигул обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку одежды для реализации. Таттигул является одним из трех членов группы "Марат".  Доходы она планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего торгового павильона.
texts.en: Tattigul is 36, married, and a mother of five children.  To earn money for her family, Tattigul started selling knitted goods in 2010, setting up her business with 50,000 som worth of capital.  Today, it brings in roughly 35,000 per month, and she currently has 200,000 som worth of clothing and shoes in stock.  To further develop her business, Tattigul has requested a loan of 100,000 som from Bai Tushum Bank to stock up on clothing for resale.  She is one of the three members of the Marat group, and plans on using her extra income to further expand the store she operates out of.

loans.use: buy clothes for resale in order to attract new clients

loans.name: Raquel Marisol

texts.es:
Raquel de 33 años de edad, está acompañada y no tiene hijos, únicamente vive con su esposo que es empleado y trabaja como chofer para una institución gubernamental. Nadie depende de ella.

Raquel es comerciante y está iniciando su negocio, tiene 8 meses de estar administrando una tienda y cuanta con productos de canasta básica y de uso personal. Solicita el préstamo para comprar golosinas, bebidas, granos básicos y productos de primera necesidad, además quiere vender enchiladas, galletas y licuados ya que que tiene su refrigeradora, sus clientes le han sugerido esos productos porque en la zona es la única que tiene negocio y espera le vaya bien con la inversión.

Raquel se proyecta con una mejor tienda, por lo que espera tener mejor experiencia para agrandar su negocio.
texts.en:
Raquel is 33 years old, married with no children. She lives only with her husband who is employed as a chauffeur for a government institution. No one depends on her. 


Raquel is a businesswoman and is just beginning her business. She has managed her store for 8 months now and supplies staple goods and personal products. 


She asks for this loan to buy snacks, drinks, basic grains and convenience store products. She also wants to send enchiladas, cookies and smoothies now that she has a refrigerator. Her clients have suggested those products because she is the only one in the area to have such a business and hope that her investment goes well. 


Raquela hopes for a better business and to have a good experience in expanding her business.

loans.use: to buy snacks, drinks, basic grains and convenience store products

loans.name: Manuel Antonio

texts.es:
Manuel, de 27 años, tiene muy claro que es lo que quiere para su vida y está decidida a culminar sus estudios para salir adelante y tener una buena vida.

El desea desempeñarse como vendedora de mercancía variada tales como ropa, accesorios como billeteras y algunos cosméticos, entre otros, en el municipio de Honda.

Esta actividad desea iniciarla con el afán de buscar los recursos necesarios para su sostenimiento y para sus estudios, además de poder contribuir con los gastos en su hogar.
Es un hombre emprendedor y muy disciplinado.

El solicita un crédito para comprar un amplio surtido de ropa al por mayor y de este modo aprovechar la oportunidad que le presenta la Corporación Interactuar de ser independiente.

Tiene la esperanza de poder progresar como empresario y tener unos ingresos más estables y agradece a todas las personas que puedan contribuir con su sueño.
texts.en:
Manuel, 27, is very clear about what he wants for his life.  He has decided to complete his education in order to get ahead and have a good life.  

Manuel works selling a variety of merchandise such as clothing, accessories like wallets, and some cosmetics, among other items, in the municipality of Honda.

He wanted to start up this business because he wanted to have the resources he needed to support himself and  pay for his studies.  He also wanted to contribute to the household expenses.  He is an enterprising man who is very disciplined.

Manuel is requesting a loan to buy a broad assortment of clothing at wholesale.  This way, he can take advantage of the opportunity that Interactuar is providing him to work independently.

Manuel hopes to make progress as a businessman and to have a more stable income.  He thanks all of the people who are helping him to achieve his dream.

loans.use: to buy wholesale clothing in bulk

loans.name: Amigas Por Siempre De Miguel Grau Group

texts.es: Esta es la Nueva Alcancía “Amigas Por Siempre De Miguel Grau” La cual  está constituida por 06 socias emprendedoras con mucho optimismo de comenzar a desarrollarse en su negocio. Melissa de 26 años de edad es soltera. Ella se dedica  a la venta de juguetes de forma ambulatorio. Gracias  a su esfuerzo le va bien su negocio.  Su mayor deseo es contar con su propio local de venta. Solicitó el crédito para la compra de muñecas, carritos y peluches. La Nueva Alcancía “Amigas Por Siempre De Miguel Grau” agradece a los inversionistas Kiva por facilitarles este crédito. Melissa es la segunda del lado  izquierdo y viste polo de color plomo.
texts.en: The Amigas Por Siempre De Miguel Grau community bank has 6 members.  The members, all enterprising women, have high hopes for the futures of their businesses.  Melissa, 26, is single.  She is a street vendor and sells toys from street to street and place to place.  Thanks to her efforts, the business is successful and she hopes, she says, to eventually have a store of her own.  For now, she is applying for a loan that she will use to buy dolls, stuffed animals and other toys.  The members of Amigas Por Siempre De Miguel Grau are grateful to Kiva lenders for their support.  Melissa is the second woman from the left in the photo, wearing a silver-colored blouse.

loans.use: to stock her toy sales business.

loans.name: Moshi

texts.en:
MOSHI, who is in her late 20s, is married with two children who are still in school.  Shee has been selling cashew nuts for six years now.  She works from 06am to 04pm daily, and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be MOSHI's sixth loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She used the previous loans to keep on increase her cashew nuts stock, and has paid back all her loans successfully.  She is happy with the loan, and appreciates Kiva for the support of their group.  

She used the profit to pay school fees, bought a TV set, a fridge, sofa set, a deck, two cupboards for clothes for kitchen utensils, and covered household expenses. She will use this loan to increase on the cashew nuts stock and sell to more clients.  She dreams of buying a big stock of cashew nuts.

MOSHI will make sure she is paying back the loan at the loan's schedule time.

loans.use: to increase the cashew nuts stock

loans.name: Kurvonby

texts.en:
Kurvonby was born in 1966 year. She lives with her husband and three children in a rural area. She is one of the hardworking and smart members of her family. 

Kurvonby has been busy with an agriculture business for many years. She grows onions, melons, and watermelons on 7 ha land. Kurvonby works hard every day, from early morning till late evening. She has additional income from animal husbandry. She sells her products to local people. 

She must make a new sowing of onions, watermelons, etc., but she has not money. She is asking for a loan of 7,000 Somoni to buy seeds and mineral fertilizer. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To buy seeds and mineral fertilizer

loans.name: Villa Pumacahua Group

texts.es: Carolina de 36 años de edad es casada con 03 hijos dependientes. Ella pertenece al grupo “Villa Pumacahua” La cual  está conformado por 07 socios comunitarios y solidarios. Carolina se dedica  a la confección de prendas de vestir. Hace más de 01 año que se viene elaborando prendas para caballeros y damas en un local alquilado. Su mayor deseo es tener su propio local de venta.   Solicitó el crédito para la compra de telas, hilos, botones y tijeras. El grupo “Villa Pumacahua” agradece a todas las personas que facilitaron este crédito. Carolina es la segunda del lado derecho y viste chaleco azul.
texts.en: Carolina, 36, is married with three dependent children. She belongs to the Villa Pumacahua Group which is comprised of a community of 7 supportive partners. Carolina makes clothing. She began making garments for men and women in a rented locale over a year ago. Her greatest desire is to have her own sales locale. She applied for a loan to buy fabric, thread, button, and scissions. The group Villa Pumacahua thanks everyone who provided this loan. Carolina is the second on the right in the blue vest.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics, thread, buttons, and scissors to make clothing

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
MARIAM, who is in her mid 40s, is a divorcee with four kids who are still in school  She has been a food vendor for 18 years now.  She works from 06am to 08pm daily, and is able to make a fair monthly profit.  

This will be MARIAM's third loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She used the previous loans to keep on increasing the mamalishe stock, and has paid back all her loans successfully.  She used the profit to pay school fees and covered household expenses.  She will use this loan to stock the out of stock items in the food store.  She dreams of building another house and to renovate her working place.  

MARIAM will make sure she pays back her loan at the loan schedule time.

loans.use: to restock the out of stock items in the food store.

loans.name: Normie

texts.en:
Normie sells charcoals within her local community. She has been doing this kind of business for over two years. Normie is married, and had four children. Her two children are attending to school, while the other two left are still infant-aged. 

She and her husband would like to have a stable source of income to meet all their family needs. With regards to their situation, Normie decided to borrow additional capital amounting to PHP7,000. This amount of loan will help her charcoal sales business grow because she could supply all her costumers.

Normie hopes for approval of her requested loan.

loans.use: to buy 20 sacks of charcoals

loans.name: Nodira

texts.en:
Nodira was born in 1980 year. She lives with her four children and husband in Tajikistan. Nodira’s husband is a driver. They try to offer a good living standard to their children. 

Nodira has been busy with an agriculture business for more than 10 years. She mainly feeds cows and sells milk and milk products to local people. She has additional income from growing vegetables. 

Now Nodira wants to buy coal and wood to keep her house warmly, but she has not money. She is asking for a loan of 7,000 Somoni to buy coal and wood. 

She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To buy coal and wood

loans.name: Bernard

texts.en: Bernard is 26 years old, married and had a child. He is a farmer planting and harvesting rice to sell. He also hires laborers who help him do farming activities such as plowing, planting and harvesting rice. He wants to keep producing abundant harvest and now is asking for additional capital to invest in his farm. He needs additional capital of PHP 30,000 to buy fertilizers, insecticides and pay labor fees in the farming business. He hopes to continue providing good nourishment to crops and gain good returns out of his sacrifices and patience in the rice field.

loans.use: pay for fertilizers, insecticides & labor fees

loans.name: Eladio Antonio

texts.es:
Eladio, de 50 años, ha optado por montar un negocio de preparación y venta de Solteritas en el municipio de Bello, las solteritas son alimentos a base de azúcar muy populares en la cultura de Colombia.

Eladio trabaja todos los días desde las 6 de la mañana hasta la 6 de la tarde, es un hombre muy responsable, juicioso y aplicado con su negocio.

Entre sus sueños más latentes esta el poder tener un gran restaurante en el que ofrezcan distintos tipos de alimentos y puede ofrecer empleos. 

Enfrenta múltiples dificultades como el costo de los insumos, la competencia en el sector y las fuertes lluvias que azotan su puesto de trabajo.

El pide un aliento económico para capitalizar su negocio y comprar insumos como azúcar y saborizantes artificiales.

El crédito impactara su vida y su negocio de un modo muy favorable pues podrá cumplir con su sueño y tendrá una mayor variedad de producto para ofrecer a sus clientes, además de que de este negocio dependen sus hijos.
texts.en:
